page.title: 11HOME LIFE
page.content: Generally women seem to do more house hold tasks than men and girls are expecto do more than thier brothers. Was, ironing and cleaning the house are done exclusively by women. The only house is done mainly by men is cleaning ar though house hold repairs are still grally seen as a man's responsibility. Decorating, washing-up,gardening, baby-sitting, shopping for food and cooking are shared a little more though still tend to be dominated by women. Families generally find time to s down together for at least one meal on most days. Takeaway food is bought as family meal occasionally, but eating out at restraunts as a family is seen as a luxury rather than a common event.
